page.title: 05Recreation in Blithfield
page.content: Fishing, and rishing rights on the lithfield Reservoir, owned by the South Staffs. Water co. are leased to Blithfield anglers Ltd. A private club of 230 members. This is stocked with trout bought from the S.S.W. Co fish farm. Sailing there is a sailing club afiliated to the Royal Yachting club which has a 100 acres of the southern side of the reservoir. Sailing takes place on wed & thur evenings from may to August. Club point series racing is on sundays, practice racing on Sturdays, throughout the year. There are 5 classes a general fleet. Board sailing also takes place, membership having a limit of 50, and of whom have to belong to the sailing club, board sailing is not allowed during yacht racing. Boats and equipment brought to Blithfield reservoir have to be sterilized
